sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The getpriority function returns the priority of an executing process in a concurrent program. A smaller value means a faster speed.
sections.mdown_content: The **getpriority** function returns the priority of an executing **process** in a concurrent program. A smaller value means a faster speed.

sections.title: See also
sections.raw_content:
setpriority, fork and monitor.

See also predefined unit Concurrency.
